short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A chrome extension based on WCAG 2.0 to easily check contrast ratio.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your website accessibility with this tool that follows Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) to calculate the contrast ratio between colors, plus offering validators based on WCAG AA (minimum), WCAG AAA (enhanced) and custom ratio.
